section.name: AccessPlatform : What's New in 5.0
section.p: DataNucleus AccessPlatform version 5.0 extends the 4.2 capabilities supporting new Java 8 features as well as other things that required internal code restructuring. Below are some of the new features you can find in DataNucleus AccessPlatform 5.0.

ul.li: Support for Java 8 Optional for RDBMS, Cassandra, MongoDB, Excel, ODF, Neo4j, HBase and JSON
HBase : upgrade support to v1.1+ of hbase-client
Neo4j : upgrade support to v2.3+ of neo4j
MongoDB : upgrade support to v3.0+ of mongo-java-driver
Cassandra : upgrade support to v3.0+ of datastax
PostgreSQL : support for persisting collection/array of strings/ints into "array" column type
JPA : added support for nondurable identity
Support for Enum extension handling for RDBMS, Cassandra, MongoDB, Excel, ODF, Neo4j, HBase and JSON.
